sozoRobot.backward: 回去（需要停止塊才能停止）
sozoRobot.continuousRun: 繼續沿指定方向運行（需要停止塊才能停止）
sozoRobot.customBackwards: Backwards through the requested time and power then stops
sozoRobot.customBackwards|param|duration: in milliseconds to run the car, eg:500
sozoRobot.customBackwards|param|powerAdj: the factor of servo power adj　from 0 (min) to 200 (max), eg:80
sozoRobot.customForwards: 按指定的輸出前進指定的時間（以毫秒為單位）
sozoRobot.customForwards|param|duration: in milliseconds to run the car, eg:500
sozoRobot.customForwards|param|powerAdju: the factor of servo power adj　from 0 (min) to 200 (max), eg:80
sozoRobot.customLeft: 由指定的輸出向左旋轉指定的時間（以毫秒為單位）
sozoRobot.customLeft|param|duration: in milliseconds to run the car, eg:500
sozoRobot.customLeft|param|powerAdjustme: the factor of servo power adj　from 0 (min) to 200 (max), eg:80
sozoRobot.customRight: 按指定的輸出向右旋轉指定的時間（以毫秒為單位）
sozoRobot.customRight|param|duration: in milliseconds to run the car, eg:500
sozoRobot.customRight|param|powerAdjustm: the factor of servo power adj　from 0 (min) to 200 (max), eg:80
sozoRobot.driveBackwards: 返回指定的時間（以毫秒為單位）
sozoRobot.driveBackwards|param|duration: describe backwarding time in millisecond, eg:500
sozoRobot.driveForwards: 向前移動指定的時間（以毫秒為單位）
sozoRobot.driveForwards|param|duration: describe forwarding time in millisecond, eg:500
sozoRobot.forward: 前進（需要停止塊才能停止）
sozoRobot.left: 向左旋轉（需要停止塊才能停止）
sozoRobot.right: 向右旋轉（需要停止塊才能停止）
sozoRobot.turnLeft: 向左旋轉指定的時間（以毫秒為單位）
sozoRobot.turnLeft|param|duration: describe turning time in millisecond, eg:500
sozoRobot.turnRight: 向右旋轉指定的時間（以毫秒為單位）
sozoRobot.turnRight|param|duration: describe turning time in millisecond, eg:500
sozoRobot.wheelPin|param|leftPin: describe IO pin for left wheel, eg: AnalogPin.P1
sozoRobot.wheelPin|param|rightPin: describe IO pin for right wheel, eg: AnalogPin.P2
sozoRobot.wheelSpeed|param|leftSpeed: describe servo power from 0(min) to 100(max) here, eg: 15
sozoRobot.wheelSpeed|param|rightSpeed: describe servo power from 0(min) to 100(max) here, eg: 15
